item.description:
For those with tricks up their sleeves, this is a card game night!

This is an open card game night.  Whatever suits your fancy from traditional to modern, we'll divide into small groups and play different games at once whether an old favorite or to learn something new.  I'll also have an official compendium of card game rules.

Some examples of card games people in this group have been known to enjoy are:

  • Hearts
  • Cribbage
  • Wizard
  • Canasta
  • Whist or Bridge
  • Popular trick-taking card games from other countries (Briscola, Skat, Tichu, etc.)
  • Advanced card games (Coloretto, Lost Cities and others from Reiner Knizia)
  • Whimsical card games (Mystery Rummy, Fluxx, Mamma Mia, etc.)

Heck, even Sequence may make an appearance. ;-)

So if you want to play some card games or learn some new ones, this event will be for you.  We welcome new players with open arms.

This is an unregulated group event.  There may be multiple games going on at once, so just find one to jump into or get one started when you arrive!

 

---

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Card Game Night in Danvers
